fields.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
fields.description: +20 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Grants +8 Ability Power per stack and 5 stacks upon first purchase. Grants 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist (max 20 stacks). Half of the stacks are lost upon death. At 20 stacks, grants +15% Cooldown Reduction.
